moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Change Password
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will attempt to change the password of the targeted account.
        The typical usage is to change a newly created account's password on a
        remote host to avoid the error, 'System error 1907 has occurred,' which
        is caused when the account policy enforces a password change before the
        next login.
author: Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SMBDomain
options.description: Domain or Host to change password on, if not set will use the current login domain
